trans-unit.source: Release notes for Application Insights for Java
trans-unit.target: Release notes for Application Insights for Java

trans-unit.source: The latest updates.
trans-unit.target: The latest updates.

trans-unit.source: Release Notes for Application Insights SDK for Java
trans-unit.target: Release Notes for Application Insights SDK for Java

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>Application Insights SDK for Java</linkText><title></title></link> sends telemetry about your live app to <link><linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title></link>, where you can analyze its usage and performance.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>Application Insights SDK for Java</linkText><title></title></link> sends telemetry about your live app to <link><linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title></link>, where you can analyze its usage and performance.

trans-unit.source: To install the SDK in your application
trans-unit.target: To install the SDK in your application

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Get started with the SDK for Java</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Get started with the SDK for Java</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: To upgrade to the latest SDK
trans-unit.target: To upgrade to the latest SDK

trans-unit.source: After you upgrade, you'll need to merge back any customizations you made to ApplicationInsights.xml.
trans-unit.target: After you upgrade, you'll need to merge back any customizations you made to ApplicationInsights.xml.

trans-unit.source: Take a copy of it to compare with the new file.
trans-unit.target: Take a copy of it to compare with the new file.

trans-unit.source: If you're using Maven or Gradle
trans-unit.target: If you're using Maven or Gradle

trans-unit.source: If you specified a particular version number in pom.xml or build.gradle, update it.
trans-unit.target: If you specified a particular version number in pom.xml or build.gradle, update it.

trans-unit.source: Refresh your project's dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Refresh your project's dependencies.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise
trans-unit.target: Otherwise

trans-unit.source: Download the latest version of <link><linkText>Azure Libraries for Java</linkText><title></title></link> and replace the old ones.
trans-unit.target: Download the latest version of <link><linkText>Azure Libraries for Java</linkText><title></title></link> and replace the old ones.

trans-unit.source: Compare the old and new ApplicationInsights.xml.
trans-unit.target: Compare the old and new ApplicationInsights.xml.

trans-unit.source: Many of the changes you see are because we added and removed modules.
trans-unit.target: Many of the changes you see are because we added and removed modules.

trans-unit.source: Reinstate any customizations that you made.
trans-unit.target: Reinstate any customizations that you made.

trans-unit.source: Version 1.0.1
trans-unit.target: Version 1.0.1

trans-unit.source: The Java agent supports collecting dependency information about the following:
trans-unit.target: The Java agent supports collecting dependency information about the following:

trans-unit.source: HTTP calls made via HttpClient, OkHttp and RestTemplate (Spring).
trans-unit.target: HTTP calls made via HttpClient, OkHttp and RestTemplate (Spring).

trans-unit.source: Calls to Redis made via the Jedis client.
trans-unit.target: Calls to Redis made via the Jedis client.

trans-unit.source: When a configurable threshold is passed, the SDK will also fetch the call arguments.
trans-unit.target: When a configurable threshold is passed, the SDK will also fetch the call arguments.

trans-unit.source: JDBC calls made with Oracle DB and Apache Derby DB clients.
trans-unit.target: JDBC calls made with Oracle DB and Apache Derby DB clients.

trans-unit.source: Support the ‘executeBatch’ query type for prepared statements – The SDK will show the statement with the number of batches.
trans-unit.target: Support the ‘executeBatch’ query type for prepared statements – The SDK will show the statement with the number of batches.

trans-unit.source: Provide the query plan for JDBC clients that has support for that (MySql, PostgreSql) – The query plan is fetched only when a configurable threshold is crossed
trans-unit.target: Provide the query plan for JDBC clients that has support for that (MySql, PostgreSql) – The query plan is fetched only when a configurable threshold is crossed

trans-unit.source: Version 1.0.0
trans-unit.target: Version 1.0.0

trans-unit.source: Adding support for the Application Insights writer plugin for CollectD.
trans-unit.target: Adding support for the Application Insights writer plugin for CollectD.

trans-unit.source: Adding support for the Application Insights Java agent.
trans-unit.target: Adding support for the Application Insights Java agent.

trans-unit.source: Fix for a compatibility issue with supporting HttpClient versions 4.2 and later.
trans-unit.target: Fix for a compatibility issue with supporting HttpClient versions 4.2 and later.

trans-unit.source: Version 0.9.6
trans-unit.target: Version 0.9.6

trans-unit.source: Make the Java SDK compatible with servlet v2.5 and HttpClient pre-v4.3.
trans-unit.target: Make the Java SDK compatible with servlet v2.5 and HttpClient pre-v4.3.

trans-unit.source: Adding support for Java EE interceptors.
trans-unit.target: Adding support for Java EE interceptors.

trans-unit.source: Removing redundant dependencies from the Logback appender.
trans-unit.target: Removing redundant dependencies from the Logback appender.

trans-unit.source: Version 0.9.5
trans-unit.target: Version 0.9.5

trans-unit.source: Fix for an issue where custom events are not correlated with Users/Sessions due to cookie parsing errors.
trans-unit.target: Fix for an issue where custom events are not correlated with Users/Sessions due to cookie parsing errors.

trans-unit.source: Improved logic for resolving the location of the ApplicationInsights.xml configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Improved logic for resolving the location of the ApplicationInsights.xml configuration file.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous User and Session cookies will not be generated on the server side.
trans-unit.target: Anonymous User and Session cookies will not be generated on the server side.

trans-unit.source: To implement user and session tracking for web apps, instrumentation with the JavaScript SDK is now required – cookies from the JavaScript SDK are still respected.
trans-unit.target: To implement user and session tracking for web apps, instrumentation with the JavaScript SDK is now required – cookies from the JavaScript SDK are still respected.

trans-unit.source: Note that this change may cause a significant restatement of user and session counts as only user-originated sessions are being counted now.
trans-unit.target: Note that this change may cause a significant restatement of user and session counts as only user-originated sessions are being counted now.

trans-unit.source: Version 0.9.4
trans-unit.target: Version 0.9.4

trans-unit.source: Support collecting performance counters from 32-bit Windows machines.
trans-unit.target: Support collecting performance counters from 32-bit Windows machines.

trans-unit.source: Support manual tracking of dependencies using a new trackDependency method API.
trans-unit.target: Support manual tracking of dependencies using a new trackDependency method API.

trans-unit.source: Ability to tag a telemetry item as synthetic, by adding a SyntheticSource property to the reported item.
trans-unit.target: Ability to tag a telemetry item as synthetic, by adding a SyntheticSource property to the reported item.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
